title: Loging into the alpha client
body: I signed up for the alpha client some time ago and about a week ago i got an email stating i was invited to use the alpha client. So i downloaded the client and i when i try and sign into it using my account information it says that the username and password is not correct. What gives rito.....what gives

replies.body: If you have multiple accounts then the Alpha invitation may have been for another account.  You can double check your status through the [account management](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751934-General-Account-Information) section.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can help with your specific issue individually to recover access.  Hang tight!
